trans-unit.source: Ensures that the result of an activity is properly converted to a string that can be used for serial transmission.
trans-unit.target: 可确保活动的结果正确转换为可用于串行传输的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.ActivityWithResultValueSerializer"></xref> class.
Returns an indication whether an input object is an <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression"></xref> that can be serialized into a string.
trans-unit.target: 返回指示输入的对象是否为<xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression"></xref>可以序列化为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression"></xref> object that is verified for its ability to be converted to a string for serial transmission.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression"> </xref>进行验证，它能够转换为用于串行传输的字符串的对象。

trans-unit.source: Defines a context for the serialization of <xref href="System.Activities.XamlIntegration.IValueSerializableExpression"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression can be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以序列化表达式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Serializes the specified object into a string.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象序列化为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that is converted to a string for serial transmission.
trans-unit.target: 转换为用于串行传输的字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: Defines a context for the serialization of the object being that is converted into a string.
trans-unit.target: 正在转换为字符串，请定义对象的序列化的上下文。

trans-unit.source: A string version of the serializable expression.
trans-unit.target: 可序列化表达式的字符串版本。
